contents.item: Life is the totality of time
To fully communicate with people, you need to find tactics that would interest them
Do not always act out of religion
The desire to get money through jobs enslaves us
Those who waste time eventually become wasted
There's no greater joy than being able to touch People's hearts.
contents.owner: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job

contents.item: Your calling helps you to have goals
Time is the essence of life
The way we assess time as humans determines what we become
Walk and learn from the people that inspire you to do great things
Don’t let your society and environment dictate what you do with your time
Life is a race against time
Devote time wisely to discover your true self
Be conscious of your actions daily
Always account for each unit of passing time
To maximize time is to make sure that every second, minute and hour counts
What you do with your time daily is essential for spiritual and physical growth
The amount of time spent doing something is what adds value to it
Losing your job releases you from the control of the world system
Losing your job shows you the worth of your time rather the worth of money
After you discover your purpose, you have to build a platform for your calling
Money is what you get in exchange with time invested
Measure your life by the product and value you produce daily
Production is the greatest assessment of time well spent
In a job you trade your freedom and time for money.
You have to discover the essence of your life
The product you produced is the evidence of the value in your life
Life becomes a dilemma when you are living a purposeless and goalless life
Take love to people and teach them to abide by the principles of God
Invest your time in producing product or service
Life is the subtotal of time
It’s only when you find God that you can discover your calling
Time is the resource that gives birth to other things
Money is a compensation for time spent
Never give up. It might not seem easy at first but in the end, it will all be worth it
Never let a day be your control factor
Time wasted can never be compensated
Joblessness gives you control over the product of your life
If you do not work for your dream or purpose, someone else will hire you to fulfill his/hers
Always convert your time into wisdom
You’ve got little time on earth, make each day count
Time is God’s gift to us as humans
Monitor and control every passing day so as to live without regrets
You have to bring relevance to people before teaching them the ways of Christ
To convert a day is to produce a product
To get an effective product, you need to find your calling
Time should be seen and assessed in seconds, minutes, hours and days
Don’t be too engrossed with things of the world discover your purpose in life
Use time to convert yourself
Joblessness does not necessarily mean idleness
To work (at a job) is to sacrifice the life you have at the moment
Your race against life must yield effort for you to be productive
Convert your time into useful assets
Locate things that motivate you and surround yourself with people that inspire you
Evaluate and assess your life on a daily
Always invest your life in your calling and purpose
Work is an instrument through which you carry out your life mandate
Use time to discover who you are
You have to discover the needs of the people you want to minister to
A job should only be a stepping stone to being your own boss
A selfish life isn’t God’s purpose for you
Losing your job releases you to think effectively and make rational decisions
You must add value to yourself to be relevant
Discover your calling and add value to it
Time must be converted into product
After losing you job, you have to sit, relax and discover yourself
You can achieve great things by utilizing your God-given talent
Wisdom is the ability to see the invisible
Covert your time for discovery
Time given out through jobs can be channeled into something productive
Don’t make your job your assignment. Rather, make your life assignment your career and job
Faith with work yields fulfillment
A product should be made intentionally
It is the sweat of the servants that make their squire look smart.
There is a huge difference between work and a job
Life is made up of time
Getting fired from work gives you the zeal to make your own inventions
Develop your skill around your calling
Add value to yourself by exchanging your time with knowledge
Work is an instrument through which you bring yourself to fulfillment
Time used to do irrelevancies can be channeled into something productive instead
Time is the source of greatness
Dedicate time to yourself and do things that help you grow
Never allow a minute to pass without asking yourself what you did with the time
Your job cannot sustain you, only your calling can
You must always overcome your comfort zone
Everything physical is a creation of time
Maximizing time is making sure that every second is accounted for
Always work and take productive actions, do not rely on prayers and fasting alone
The best way to assess yourself is to base the assessment on the product you produce daily
